CustomField.label: Options
CustomField.description: JSON blob for PDF print options. Ignored for RAW/ZPL. Valid keys: copies, duplex (long-edge|short-edge|one-sided), paper (e.g. A4|Letter|4x6), dpi (e.g. 600x600), bin, collate (bool), color (bool), rotate (0|90|180|270), fit_to_page (bool), pages (e.g. 1,3-5), media, nup (2|4|6|9|16).
